LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays historical trend data from Behavior_Snapshot__c as an interactive line chart for the BehaviorIQ Dashboard.

property.name: daysBack
property.label: Days to Display
property.description: Number of days of trend data to show (max 90)

property.name: chartHeight
property.label: Chart Height
property.description: Height of the chart in pixels

property.name: showLegend
property.label: Show Legend
property.description: Display legend for pattern breakdown view (enabled by default)
